objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has saved stolen files including the `ntds.dit` database and the `SYSTEM` and `SECURITY` Registry hives locally to the `C:\Windows\Temp\` directory.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE SILHOUETTE May 2023)
